reviews module

reviews.admin_delete_review()[source]

Deletes a customer’s review of a product by the admin. Must pass in the post request the user’s username, the reviewed good, and the admin’s credentials.

Returns:

Success message if delete is successful. Error message if submission doesn’t exist or other error occured.

Return type:

flask.Response

reviews.delete_review()[source]

Deletes a customer’s review of a product. Must pass in the delete request the user’s username, his password, and the reviewed good.

Returns:

Success message if delete is successful. Error message if submission doesn’t exist or other error occured.

Return type:

flask.Response

reviews.flag_review()[source]

Allows to flag a customer’s review by either a user or an admin. Need to pass in the put request the flag’s value, the reviewed good, and the corresponding username.

Returns:

Success message if flag changed successfully. Error message in case of a problem.

Return type:

flask.Response

reviews.get_product_review(good)[source]

Get all reviews of a product.

Parameters:

good (str) – The reviewed good

Returns:

If successful, the reviews of the product. Else, an error message.

Return type:

flask.Response

reviews.get_review(user, good)[source]

Get a customer’s review of a product.

Parameters:

  • user (str) – The username of the customer.

  • good (str) – The reviewed good

Returns:

If successful, the review submitted by the user about the product. Else, an error message.

Return type:

flask.Response

reviews.get_user_review(user)[source]

Get all reviews submitted by a customer.

Parameters:

user (str) – The username of the customer.

Returns:

If successful, all reviews submitted by a customer. Else, an error message.

Return type:

flask.Response

reviews.submit_review()[source]

Submits a customer’s review of a product. Must pass in the post request the user’s username, his password, the reviewed good, the review, and the rating.

Returns:

Success message if submission is successful. Error message if submission already exists or other error occured.

Return type:

flask.Response

reviews.update_review()[source]

Updates a customer’s review of a product. Must pass in the put request the user’s username, his password, the reviewed good, the review, and the rating.

Returns:

Success message if update is successful. Error message if submission doesn’t exist or other error occured.

Return type:

flask.Response
